image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution hero image set inside a modern, clean Australian manufacturing facility. The scene features a diverse group of three professionals: a Facility Manager (female, mid-30s) holding a tablet (back of device visible only), a Maintenance Technician (male, 40s) wearing a high-vis vest and hard hat, and a specialized Contractor (male, 20s) inspecting a large industrial motor.
